name: Point Blanc
description:
Entry for LOWREZJAM2018

I am ### and ### to be free. Just ### or press escape to  be safe. I cannot stress enough that ### is ###, so don't do that.

Point Blanc is a short game, an attempt to tell a story through the player's actions and a sober and sparse environment.

WARNING - THERE IS SOME SLIGHT NSFW CONTENT IN THIS GAME

WASD / Arrow keys - Walk
Left mouse button - Fire
Escape - Quit
